name: gym-access-control
description: Gym access control system with QR code scanning

scripts.build: echo 'Starting build process...' && npm install && echo 'Installing client dependencies...' && cd client && npm install && echo 'Building React app...' && npm run build && echo 'Build completed, installing server dependencies...' && cd ../server && npm install && echo 'All done!'
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed

author: Gym Access Control System
